item.title: @elonmusk: The United States processed 27 million online voter registration applications between 2018 and 2020....
item.description: The United States processed 27 million online voter registration applications between 2018 and 2020. These 27 million online applications required no proof of citizenship.

item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: Globe Telecom has signed a deal with@Starlinkto launch direct-to-cell satellite connectivity (...
item.description: NEWS: Globe Telecom has signed a deal with@Starlinkto launch direct-to-cell satellite connectivity (Starlink Mobile) in the Philippines within the next few months. The operator said in a statement it will be the first to offer Starlink‚Äôs satellite-to-mobile service in the Philippines and Southeast Asia, and the second in Asia.

item.title: @elonmusk: I just watched a video of a girl who was put on testosterone at 14 talk about her voice changing and...
item.description: I just watched a video of a girl who was put on testosterone at 14 talk about her voice changing and how no one told her that testosterone doesn‚Äôt just lower your voice. It literally thickens the vocal cords, and the female larynx is not built to accommodate that, now it hurts for her to even speak. I had no idea and I wonder how much other crap like this nobody is being told. Putting children on this crap and changing their lives forever should be a crime for both parents and doctors.

item.title: @elonmusk: We know the algorithm is dumb and needs massive improvements, but at least you can see us struggle t...
item.description: We know the algorithm is dumb and needs massive improvements, but at least you can see us struggle to make it better in real-time and with transparency. No other social media companies do this.

item.title: @elonmusk: BREAKING: ùïè has open sourced its For You feed algorithm, the same production system running today an...
item.description: BREAKING: ùïè has open sourced its For You feed algorithm, the same production system running today and powered by Grok from xAI. The full code is live on GitHub and will be refreshed every 4 weeks. Your feed blends posts from accounts you follow with posts discovered across all of ùïè, then ranks them using a Grok based transformer that predicts how likely you are to like, reply, repost, click, or watch. Instead of one simple score, the model predicts many actions and combines them for a more nuanced ranking. Everything learns directly from user behavior. Intelligence lives inside the model, not scattered pipelines. The system is modular, transparent, and stable, with each post scored independently so results are cacheable and consistent. This is one of the most open looks ever at a large scale social feed ranking system.
